verses.roman:
subuddhi-rāya bahu sneha kare sanātane
vyavahāra-sneha sanātana nāhi māne

synonyms: subuddhi-rāya—Subuddhi Rāya; bahu—much; sneha—affection; kare—does; sanātane—unto Sanātana Gosvāmī; vyavahāra-sneha—love and affection because of a previous relationship; sanātana—Sanātana Gosvāmī; nāhi māne—was hesitant to accept.
translation: Subuddhi Rāya and Sanātana Gosvāmī knew one another before accepting the renounced order. Therefore Subuddhi Rāya showed much affection to Sanātana Gosvāmī, but Sanātana Gosvāmī hesitated to accept his sentiments and affections.
